backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixins, access control, user data maps, activity tracking, ponds, posts, ribbits, tags, likes, and multiple data types for backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains structured feature evidence reports specifying UI changes, related files, components, and test IDs for FrogProfilePage back button updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing layouts, pages, and UI behaviors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up root div, favicon, metadata, and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, loads all pages including FrogProfilePage, and wraps the app in theme and router providers.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Provides a bookmark toggle button using useBookmarks with customizable colors and click-handling prevention.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying navigation links and attribution with a heart icon and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header handling search, navigation, user avatar loading, mobile menu, and search recording with dropdowns and modals.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapping pages with header, footer, and mobile sidebar drawer, auto-closing drawer on route change.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Sidebar navigation with route matching and recent activity previews, including activity items linking to lily pages.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post with avatar, metadata, image handling, like/share interactions, and optional tag/user visibility.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper for the left sidebar with body scroll locking and slide-in animation.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave actions with loading states and visibility info.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile pond header with banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation for feed/about.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user ribbit with avatar, timestamp, linked lily title, content, and navigation to conversation.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a threaded ribbit with avatar, timestamp, like and reply interactions, and nested depth indentation.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Displays trending ponds, popular tags, and popular recent posts using fetched data with loading states.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Full-screen mobile search modal showing trending searches or suggestions based on user input.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Dropdown for search input that shows trending searches or suggestions depending on the query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Shows top, trending, and newest tags via reusable modules with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled tab list and tab trigger components with underline-specific classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs in localStorage with helpers to toggle, add, remove, and clear bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced value that updates after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a media query matches the current viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for ponds, membership, profiles, search, and mutations interacting with an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers with theme variables, dark mode values, and custom UI utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short notations like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image validation, resizing, and compression with GIF detection and canvas-based processing.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes pond names to alphanumeric lowercase and provides error messages.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link via Web Share API or falls back to clipboard copying with toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes tags to alphanumeric lowercase and returns error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, IDs, Froggy Phrase storage, and settings backup using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements a per-lily view count cooldown using timestamps stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page describing the platform, features, and community guidelines with styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays all ponds with loading states, join status, and links to create or view individual ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form for creating text, image, or link lilies with tag suggestions, validation, and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Allows users to create a new pond with validation and optional banner and profile image uploads using compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for post creation.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Shows a frog user's profile with avatar, stats, posts, comments, and loading/not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home feed with trending and new sorting, sidebars, search support, and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a lily post, its metadata, ribbits, likes, and handles view count increments with cooldowns.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed pond information including visibility, moderators, description, and leave-pond actions.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pondâ€™s feed of lilies with join/leave functionality and mobile/desktop layouts.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a post page.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Shows locally bookmarked lilies with loading states and removal options.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Lists top, trending, and newest tags with navigation to individual tag pages.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific canonicalized tag with sorting options and redirects if needed.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: React page providing username changes, avatar upload, froggy phrase management, pond membership actions, and admin tools using numerous queries and UI components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, animations, radii, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, known issue about back button placement on the Frog Profile page, and related feature requirements.
